description: From Middle English *fukken, probably of Germanic origin: either from Old English *fuccian or Old Norse *fukka, both from Proto-Germanic *fukkōną, from Proto-Indo-European *pewǵ- (“to strike, punch, stab”). Compare windfucker and its debated etymology.

Possibly attested in a 772 AD charter that mentions a place called Fuccerham, which may mean "ham (“home”) of the fucker" or "hamm (“pasture”) of the fucker"; a John le Fucker in a record from 1278 may just be a variant of Fulcher, like Fucher, Foker, etc. The earliest unambiguous use of the word in a clearly sexual context, in any stage of English, appears to be in court documents from Cheshire, England, which mention a man called "Roger Fuckebythenavele" (possibly tongue-in-cheek, or directly suggestive of a depraved sexual act) on December 8, 1310. It was first listed in a dictionary in 1598. Scots fuk/fuck is attested slightly earlier, probably reinforcing the Northern Germanic/Scandinavian origin theory. From 1500 onward, the word has been in continual use, superseding jape and sard and largely displacing swive.
A range of folk-etymological backronyms, such as "fornication under consent of the king" and "for unlawful carnal knowledge", are all demonstrably false.

entries.meaning: (vulgar, colloquial) Used as an intensifier for the words "yes" and "no".
examples: Synonyms: hell, god, shit, heck
Do you censor your swearing? – Fuck no.

entries.meaning: (vulgar, colloquial) An act of sexual intercourse.
examples: Synonyms: see Thesaurus:copulation

entries.meaning: (vulgar, colloquial) A sexual partner, especially a casual one.
examples: Synonyms: see Thesaurus:sexual partner
Synonyms: dickhead; see also Thesaurus:jerk

entries.meaning: (vulgar, colloquial) The smallest amount of concern or consideration.
examples: Synonyms: shit, damn
I don't give a fuck.

verbs.description: fuck (third-person singular simple present fucks, present participle fucking, simple past and past participle fucked)

entries.meaning: (vulgar, colloquial, intransitive) To have sexual intercourse; to copulate.
examples: Synonyms: bang, do it, eff, have sex, hump, screw, shag; see also Thesaurus:copulate
Fighting for peace is like fucking for virginity.

entries.meaning: (vulgar, colloquial, transitive) To have sexual intercourse with.
examples: Synonyms: bang, eff, give someone one, hump, ream, screw, shag; see also Thesaurus:copulate with

entries.meaning: (vulgar, colloquial, transitive) To insert one's penis, a dildo, or other object, into a person or a specified orifice or cleft sexually; to penetrate.
examples: We decided to switch things around and have him fuck me tonight.
fuck me in the ass, really fuck my ass
A skinny, boyish-looking guy getting fucked by a huge muscle man.

entries.meaning: (vulgar, colloquial) To put in an extremely difficult or impossible situation.
examples: I'm afraid they're gonna fuck you on this one.

entries.meaning: (vulgar, colloquial) To defraud, deface, or otherwise treat badly.
examples: I got fucked at the used car lot.

entries.meaning: (vulgar, colloquial, often derogatory) Used to express great displeasure with, or contemptuous dismissal of, someone or something.
examples: Synonyms: bugger, eff, to hell with, screw
Fuck those jerks, and fuck their stupid rules!

entries.meaning: (vulgar, colloquial, usually followed by up) To break, to destroy.
examples: Synonyms: annihilate, obliterate, ruin; see also Thesaurus:destroy

entries.meaning: (vulgar, colloquial) Used in a phrasal verb: fuck with (“to play with, to tinker”).
examples: Synonyms: mess, toy

entries.meaning: (vulgar, transitive, comedy) To make a joke at one's expense; to make fun of in an embarrassing manner.
(colloquial, vulgar, transitive, Ireland, Britain, Scotland) To throw, to lob something. (angrily)
examples: Synonym: feck
He fucked the dirty cloth out the window.
She fucked her mobile at his head in anger.
The sergeant fucked me upside down.

entries.meaning: (colloquial, vulgar, intransitive) To be very good, to rule, go hard.
examples: Yo dude, did you check out their new album? Shit fucks bro.
